segments.text: What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My wife and I want to see the places of interest in Shenzhen , Guangzhou and Zhuhai . Can you arrange a tour for us ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long would you like to stay In these cities ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There is a three-day package tour . You will have 3 full days in the cities . It is a general tour of the cities . The itinerary includes the places of interest such as Window of the World , China Folk Culture Village . Chen Clan Academy , Southern Yue Tomb , and Gongbei Market .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds good . How much is the tour ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It includes your air fare , your hotel accommodations and the meals .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could we have you make all the necessary plane , hotel , and tour reservations ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . we could do that for you .
segments.speaker: S1
